## Ozone vs Solar radiation colored based on month

```{r plot,echo=FALSE,message=FALSE}

library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
data("airquality")
library(plotly)
plot_ly(airquality, x =~Ozone, y =~Solar.R, type = "scatter", mode="markers",color = ~Month)

```
